title: Learndirect - England, Wales and Northern Ireland

details.description: Learndirect offers information and advice about training and qualifications. Its website has courses and support facilities for businesses and individuals
details.body: Learndirect offers information and advice about training and qualifications. Its website features an online portfolio of courses and support facilities for both businesses and individuals.
details.short_description: Advice on training and a variety of courses
